story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker scored 46 out of 100. Solid tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker?

broll_sources.query: Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker gravel race

beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker. Hawkinsville, Georgia. 75 mi. Rolling Georgia gravel with moderate climbing.
beats.text_on_screen: Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker | Hawkinsville, Georgia | 75 mi

broll_sources.query: Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker route map
Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker course walkthrough

beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Time to break down the scorecard. Length. 3 out of 5. Proper race distance. Enough to hurt. Three distance options accommodate different riders: 41-mile short course, 72-mile intermediate, and 106-mile long course. Experience. 3 out of 5. Memorable course. Has character. Fully stocked aid stations feature electrolyte mix from S. Community. 3 out of 5. Genuine community feel. People stick around. The event maintains strong local support with 'a huge shoutout to the town of Hawkinsville for being such great hosts each year. Value. 3 out of 5. The math works out. Barely. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Standard gravel race budget. Logistics. 2 out of 5. Basic setup. Don't expect hand-holding. Start location at 42 South Lumpkin St in Hawkinsville is consistent across sources, with 300-rider field size and multiple distance options (41, 72, 106 miles). Technicality. 2 out of 5. Mild technical demands. Pick decent tires. Course features 'Georgia red clay, red dirt, white kaolin, loam, dust over crust, and of course. Elevation. 2 out of 5. Some ups and downs. Manageable. The 'longer, steeper hills' mentioned in official descriptions align with the 3,000 feet over 75 miles, creating sustained climbing through Georgia's rolling agricultural landscape.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest, in rapid succession. Climate. 2 out of 5. Weather cooperates more often than not. Adventure. 2 out of 5. Mild adventure. Scenic ride with a number plate. Prestige. 2 out of 5. Building a name. Not there yet. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Basic but functional. Gets the job done. Field Depth. 2 out of 5. Modest field. Some fast riders in the mix. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Oxygen plentiful. Power output normal.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: Travel, lodging, and the unsexy details.

broll_sources.query: Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker race day

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Fly into: Macon 45 minutes or Atlanta 2 hours
Lodging: Hawkinsville has limited lodging. Macon has more options.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Central Georgia Regional Gravel. If you're in Georgia and want a local rolling gravel event. yes, it's a solid regional race. If you're from out of state. there are better options.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker isn't quite right for you. For better Southeast events: Gravel Worlds, Pisgah Monster-Cross, Hot Springs Gravel Gauntlet. For similar regional events: other Georgia gravel races.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Gravel Roll - Pecan Shaker? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.
